activities: Our website stores the personal information (name, email address, mailing address) of EU/EEA citizens that either sign up for a trial of our software/services or purchase our software/services. In addition, customers that use our hosted services may store test data and user data related to the development and testing of their software applications. The test data may contain the personal information of EU/EEA citizens and the user accounts in the system will contain the name and email address of their employees who will be EU/EEA citizens.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer data from our customers, and test data for their software testing activities. The data covered does include manually processed data.
